api_list.name: Collection Details
api_list.description: Get all details of selected collection

api_list.name: Collections Stats
api_list.description: Get list of NFTs Collections Stats
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nft-scanner.p.rapidapi.com/collections"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nft-scanner.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
